name: justquery
description: A query package for JC3MP servers.
author: md678685 <mathew678@hotmail.co.uk>

scripts.test: echo 'Not yet implemented, use script "run_server" to start emulator' && exit 1
scripts.run_server: cp ./*.js jcmpserver/packages/justcord && cd jcmpserver && jcmp-server && rm packages/justcord/*.js
